summary.para: Receives a notification when one of the dynamic flags of the TF_STATUS structure changes.

param.name: pic
param.para: Pointer to the interface whose status has changed.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Indicates that one of the dynamic flags changed.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method receives a callback when one of the flags of the dwDynamicFlags member of the TF_STATUS structure changes value. To obtain the changed flag(s), use the method.

summary.para: The ITfStatusSink interface supports changes to the global document status. This advise sink is installed by calling with IID_ITfStatusSink. A text service can optionally implement this interface.
